meaningMnemonic: The <radical>moon</radical> has a lot of <radical>power</radical> that is <radical>power</radical> it gets from the <radical>power</radical> of every <kanji>armpit</kanji> of every human on earth! Why does your armpit smell? It’s because the moon is draining the power from your armpit. The moon saps power from your armpit and that power is sucked up into the sky where the moon collects the power for its own devices.
readingMnemonic: This is a pretty <reading>wacky</reading> (わき) <kanji>armpit</kanji> image isn’t it? Seeing lines of power traveling from your armpit to the moon. Definitely wacky. Have you ever seen something this wacky in real life?
